titleStmt.title: A brief vindication of the non-conformists from the charge of schisme as it was managed against them in a sermon preached before the Lord Mayor by Dr. Stillingfleet, Dean of St. Pauls.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
